chinese: 東門之楊、其葉牂牂。昏以為期、明星煌煌。
english: On the willows at the east gate,The leaves are very luxuriant.The evening was the time agreed on,And the morning star is shining bright.

chinese: 東門之楊、其葉肺肺。昏以為期、明星晢晢。
english: On the willows at the east gate,The leaves are dense.The evening was the time agreed on,And the morning star is shining bright.
